description:
The Prison of the Dead Synopsis

This is a magical prison. It could extract the souls of people who died in various worlds, and at the same time, it could also allow people to obtain the ability of the souls of the dead.
When Qin Ge woke up, he was shocked that he had come into the world of One Piece. Even more strange was that he found a prison in his body.
>
